name: Sparkling Punch
description: Sparkling apple cider, fresh orange juice, and lemonade concentrate blend into light and refreshing non-alcoholic punch in this easy recipe.
directions: Thinly slice the lemons and the oranges and place in a large punch bowl.
Pour in the thawed lemonade. Gently stir in the club soda and the sparkling apple cider.
Add sugar to taste. Add ice.
